sourcesContent:
<template>
  <SidebarMenu :menu="menu" :collapsed="collapsed" @update:collapsed="updateCollapsed" />
</template>

<script>
import { SidebarMenu } from 'vue-sidebar-menu';
import 'vue-sidebar-menu/dist/vue-sidebar-menu.css';

export default {
  name: 'AppSidebar',
  components: {
    SidebarMenu,
  },
  props: {
    menu: {
      type: Array,
      required: true,
    },
    collapsed: {
      type: Boolean,
      default: false,
    },
    width: {
      type: String,
      default: '200px',
    },
    widthCollapsed: {
      type: String,
      default: '80px',
    },
    showOneChild: {
      type: [Boolean, String],
      default: false,
    },
    showChild: {
      type: Boolean,
      default: false,
    },
    rtl: {
      type: Boolean,
      default: false,
    },
    relative: {
      type: Boolean,
      default: false,
    },
    hideToggle: {
      type: Boolean,
      default: false,
    },
    theme: {
      type: String,
      default: '',
    },
    disableHover: {
      type: Boolean,
      default: false,
    },
    linkComponentName: {
      type: String,
      default: undefined,
    },
  },
  methods: {
    updateCollapsed(newValue) {
      this.$emit('update:collapsed', newValue);
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
/* Add your custom styles here */
</style>
